misc

Class HumanAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • misc.HumanAttributes

  • public class HumanAttributes
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for holding information about humans.

    • Constructor Summary

      Construct a HumanAttributes object that wraps a Human.
